title: Draven still 1v5ing with right items.
body:
I feel like its a problem when you dont even need to build blademasters or imperials to justify building a 2 star draven.

If you have a rageblade/bloodthirster its literally worth it. As long as your other units stay alive long enough for him to use his ability he will still just go hyper carry mode and slay 5 champions no sweat. god forbid they get a rapidfire too, then its honestly just ggez. 

Nerfing his attack speed on his ability would be a good start, so he isnt already throwing axes at the speed of light from rageblade.

replies.body: There are plenty of ways to counter Draven.  My personal favorite is {{champion:201}} {{item:3075}} .  He literally 3 shots himself.
This will all change when the new {{item:1051}} is introduced.  Give it some time.

You do realize that then adcs will get Blood Thirster, IE, and some form of the Glove to get Crit chance?

It's going to be far worse, because BT will actually be able to leech enough to 1v4.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=mP8w3dBr,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-08-31T01:37:07.474+0000)
>
> You do realize that then adcs will get Blood Thirster, IE, and some form of the Glove to get Crit chance?
> 
> It's going to be far worse, because BT will actually be able to leech enough to 1v4.

Get a {{item:3046}}.  Or dodge of your own.

That's gonna be part of the problem. Rounds are now infamous for only giving gold, and now the item pool is going to be 1/8 more diluted, so getting any specific item, isn't going to be as reliable, outside of Carousels.

Furthermore, a single PD won't protect an entire team vs 45% Crit Gunslingers or 65-85% Crit Assassins. They will kill around the person with the PD so fast that killing the PD user won't be an issue the next time their skills come around.

I have a feeling now that the Always hits mod is off the RFC, it'll be a contest of pure Yordles vs Last Whisper...... which is going to be a harder item to earn than previous items. No-Dodge comps aren't going to have a chance, because of how strong 95% Dodge team can be, especially of augmented by items like Dragon Tooth/PD/Thornmail.
